# 2025 GENERAL SPORTS OFFER PRODUCT FACT FILE ![img-0.jpeg](img-0.jpeg) > The image depicts a person wearing a sparkling, ornate figure skating or dance costume with intricate beadwork and embellishments. The person's head has been replaced with a large, glittery pink ball, giving a surreal and humorous effect. The background is plain and light-colored, which emphasizes the costume and the unusual head replacement. The person's pose suggests they are mid-performance or striking a pose, with one arm extended downward and the other bent slightly. ![img-1.jpeg](img-1.jpeg) > The image features a black background with the year "2025" prominently displayed in large white text at the top. Below that, there is a white section containing the words "GENERAL S" in bold black letters. Underneath, in smaller black text, it says "PRODUCT FACT FIL." The overall design appears to be a label or cover page for a product fact file related to the year 2025. # 2025 SPORTS FEED SERVICE PRODUCT FACT FILE # SPORTS FEED SERVICE ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - A real-time sports news feed - Production available in 6 languages: French, English, German, Spanish, Arabic and Portuguese - Hourly coverage: 24/7, in real time - Non-regionalised feed | Description | Sports coverage | | --- | --- | | Sports events | Football, cycling, cricket, Formula 1, rugby, tennis, athletics, basketball, golf, handball, swimming and much more… | | Sports extras | Football, cycling, cricket, Formula 1, rugby, tennis, athletics, basketball, golf, handball, swimming and much more… | ## *Ratio per language for annual production in 2024** ![img-2.jpeg](img-2.jpeg) > The image shows a pie chart illustrating the distribution of stories per day in different languages, totaling 292 stories (excluding updates). The chart is divided into six colored segments representing each language: > > - Arabic (light blue) accounts for 10% of the stories. > - German (purple) makes up 16%. > - English (red) comprises 20%. > - Spanish (orange) represents 14%. > - French (blue) is the largest segment with 35%. > - Portuguese (yellow) accounts for 5%. | SUBSCRIPTION | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | | Monthly subscription | Via satellite or FTP for direct integration into the customer's system API AFP News | | New | *Average volume from January to December 2024 **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events | # 2025 ## SID SPORTS TEXT SERVICE PRODUCT FACT FILE # SID SPORTS TEXT Service ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Aimed at a German-speaking media, corporate and institutional clientele living mainly in Germany or in Europe and looking for rich coverage of sports news. - German correspondents present in Paris, Brussels, Washington, Istanbul. - Hourly coverage: 24/7 in real time. ## COVERAGE - Rich coverage of sports relating to themes: football, tennis, athletics, etc. - Sporting information managed by the SID office based in Cologne, aimed primarily at a German-speaking clientele looking for German sports news in real time. - Focus on German sports and the performance of German athletes. - The feed also covers other sports as well as the main national and special events ![img-3.jpeg](img-3.jpeg) ## COVERAGE DETAIL** - Athletics - Basketball - Cyclism - Handball - Motor sports - Ski - Football - Tennis - Olympics ## PRODUCT FORMATS - Delivery of metadata: XML, NewsML and jpg, if the story includes photos. ## SUBSCRIPTION - Monthly subscription to the complete feed or to a selection within the feed ## DELIVERY METHODS - FTP or satellite - AFP - Forum - SIDForum - API *Average volume from January to December 2024 **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events # 2025 ## SPORTING INFORMATION FEED IN ARABIC (ARB SPORT) PRODUCT FACT FILE # SPORTING INFORMATION FEED IN ARABIC ## "ARB SPORT" EDITION ### EDITORIAL FORMAT - Aimed at Arabic-speaking customers interested in world and regional sports news. - Validated by the Nicosia desk. - AFP has Arabic-speaking sports editors writing in Arabic, present in all countries of the region. - Hourly coverage: 6am to 10pm GMT, 7 days a week, in real time. ### COVERAGE - Rich coverage of sports relating to themes: football, tennis, athletics, motor racing sports, etc. - The feed also covers other sports as well as the main special, national and international (football World Cup, etc.) events. | Forecasts | Time (GMT) > The pie chart displays the distribution of various sports activities. Football has the largest share, comprising 57% of the total. Tennis accounts for 7%, while athletics, cycling, and skiing each make up 6%. Motor sports and Olympics each represent 6% and 8%, respectively. Handball and basketball have smaller shares, with 5% and 3%. Overall, football dominates the chart, followed by Olympics and tennis, with other sports having relatively smaller proportions. | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | --- | | "Sports forecast menu" | 11:30am | Forecasts on ARB Sport service themes: football, athletics, tennis, basketball. | ### Coverage details** ![img-4.jpeg](img-4.jpeg) | PRODUCT FORMATS | SUBSCRIPTION | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | --- | | NewsML-G2, IIM, NewsML-1.1, ANPA | Monthly subscription to the full service or to the section. | API Satellite or FTP AFP News | **Average volume from January to December 2024* **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events* # 2025 SPORTS PHOTO SERVICE PRODUCT FACT FILE # SPORTS PHOTO SERVICE ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Pictures captioned in English and classified according to IPTC norms. - The number of pictures can reach 1,200 per day during weekends or for major special events. - Coverage: 24/7, in real-time ## Sports coverage Sports events Sports extras ## Description Football, cycling, cricket, Formula 1, rugby, tennis, athletics, basketball, golf, handball, swimming and much more... Sporting Institutions (IOC, FIFA, federations, clubs, athletes, sponsors) > The image shows a pie chart illustrating the distribution of reports per day (excluding updates) across different sports. The total number of reports is 30. The chart segments are color-coded and labeled with percentages: > > - Football accounts for the largest portion at 67%. > - Basketball makes up 8%. > - Motor sports represent 7%. > - Tennis also accounts for 7%. > - Olympics comprise 9%. > - Athletics is the smallest segment at 2%. > > To the left of the pie chart, there is a large orange number "30*" indicating the total reports per day, with a note below stating "(excluding updates)". The sports are listed with corresponding colors: Athletics (purple), Basketball (light blue), Motor sports (orange), Football (blue), Tennis (red), and Olympics (yellow). . Other themes relating to sport such as doping, justice, people, etc. ## Coverage details** ![img-5.jpeg](img-5.jpeg) PRODUCT FORMATS - Image size via satellite: 1.5 MB - Image size via FTP: - 1.5 MB - Formats via AFP Forum: 512 pixels, 768 pixels or original size - 800 KB for Africa SUBSCRIPTION - One-shot sales - Quota, with or without over quota - Photo feed (annual subscription) > The image shows a pie chart illustrating the distribution of photos taken per day in various sports categories. The chart is accompanied by a large blue text on the left indicating an average of 1,490 photos per day. The sports categories and their respective percentages are as follows: > > - Football (blue): 39% > - Olympics (gray): 22% > - Cricket (red): 7% > - Tennis (light blue): 11% > - Basketball (black): 2% > - Rugby (green): 3% > - Motor sports (purple): 9% > - Cycling (yellow): 4% > - Athletics (orange): 3% > > The pie chart visually represents the proportion of photos taken in each sport, with football being the most photographed sport and basketball the least. ## DELIVERY METHODS - Regionalised feeds available via satellite or FTP - API - AFP News # 2025 INFOGRAPHICS & VIDEOGRAPHICS SPORTS ## PRODUCT FACT FILE ![img-6.jpeg](img-6.jpeg) > The image features the AFP Sports logo on a yellow background. The logo includes the text "AFP" in bold blue letters, with a solid blue circle replacing the letter "O" in "AFP." To the right of "AFP," the word "Sports" is written in black. The overall design is simple and clean, emphasizing the brand's focus on sports coverage. # SPORTS INFOGRAPHICS & VIDEOGRAPHICS SERVICE ## SPORTS INFOGRAPHICS ### EDITORIAL FORMAT - Graphics combining information, images and data - Production available in 6 languages: French, English, Arabic, Spanish, German and Portuguese | Sports coverage | Description | | --- | --- | | Sports events | Systematic coverage of major Sports events: football World cup and Champions’ League, Olympic Summer and Winter Games, Tour de France, Formula One presentation On merit coverage of major sports development: record breaking, sport legends career summary… | | Sports extras | Explainer on new technologies and innovations in sports, on doping issues… | ### *Ratio per language for annual production in 2024** ![img-7.jpeg](img-7.jpeg) | PRODUCT FORMATS | SUBSCRIPTION | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | --- | | .AI .PNG (standard or retina) .JPEG (standard or retina) .PDF EPS .JPEG | One-shot sales Quota, with or without over-quota Infographics feed (annual subscription) > The image shows a pie chart illustrating the distribution of language learning infographics per day. The chart is divided into five segments, each representing a different language: German (yellow), English (purple), Spanish (light blue), French (orange), and Portuguese (blue). The percentages for each segment are 24% for German, 24% for English, 21% for Spanish, 16% for French, and 15% for Portuguese. To the left of the pie chart, there is a large yellow number "6*" with the text "Infographics per day" underneath. Also available via Online News via FTP for direct integration | Regionalised feeds available via satellite or FTP API AFP News | **Average volume from January to December 2024* **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events like Olympics* # SPORTS INFOGRAPHICS & VIDEOGRAPHICS SERVICE ## SPORTS VIDEOGRAPHICS ### EDITORIAL FORMAT - Videographics combine text, images, video and 3D modelling elements with audio voice-over and a separate dopesheet - Formats dedicated to digital and audiovisual media: TV, online editors, mobiles, tablets, public screens… Available in 6 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Arabic, and Portuguese - Separate audio voice-over and script - Ready to publish format or editable format for translation and integration into your story. | Sports coverage | Description | | --- | --- | | Sports events | Systematic coverage of special events: Winter and Summer Olympic Games, FIFA World Cup | | Sports extras | Focus on new technologies and innovations in sports, including in Formula 1 | ### *Ratio per language for annual production in 2024** ![img-8.jpeg](img-8.jpeg) > The image features a pie chart illustrating the distribution of videographics per language, along with a statistic on the total number of videographics produced annually. The pie chart is divided into five segments, each representing a different language: German (light blue), English (orange), Spanish (blue), French (yellow), and Portuguese (red). The percentages for each segment are approximately 4% for German, 27% for English, 28% for Spanish, 16% for French, and 25% for Portuguese. To the left of the chart, there is a large, bold yellow text indicating "75*" videographics per year, with a note below stating "videographics per year." ## PRODUCT FORMATS - JPEG - Adobe Flash [16:9] 640x360 (.f4v) - MPEG4 H.264 [16:9] 1280x720 (.mp4) - MPEG4 H.264 [16:9] 640x360 (.mp4) - MPEG2 [4:3] 720x576 (.mp2) - One-shot sales - Quota, with or without over-quota - Videographics feed (annual subscription) - Also available via Online News via FTP for direct integration ## DELIVERY METHODS - Regionalised feeds available via satellite or FTP - API - AFP News **Average volume from January to December 2024** **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events like Olympics** # 2025 SPORTS DATA FEED PRODUCT FACT FILE # SPORTS DATA FEED ## EDITORIAL FORMAT ## The largest catalogue of sports data More than 2,000 streams of sporting results covered per year Sporting data and performance statistics on the main matches and all competitions in real time Reliable, accurate and timely feeds, suitable for all types of media Available in 18 languages including French, English, German, Spanish, Italian, Chinese and Portuguese Other languages available | Sports coverage | Description | | :-- | :-- | | Football | Domestic leagues, international cups, European
competitions | | Formula 1 | World championship | | Cycling | World championship | | Rugby | World Cup, Top 14, Pro D2, Champions Cup, 6 Nations | | Basketball | NBA, Euroleague, Europe Cup, EuroCup, World Cup | | Olympic Games | Summer and Winter Games | | Tennis | ATP / WTA, Billie Jean King Cup and Davis Cup | | Athletics | World Athletics meetings, World Championships, Diamond
League | | Volleyball | Women's and Men's European Volleyball Championships | PRODUCT FORMATS SUBSCRIPTION DELIVERY METHODS XML JSON One or several competitions / sports. One-off events (one-shot) Widgets Via API, for optimal integration Database-to-database replication # 2025 AFPTV SPORTS FR \& EN PRODUCT FACT FILE # AFPTV SPORTS IN FRENCH ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Raw images with or without sound. - Fully edited video reports - Video length: from 30 seconds to 4 minutes / profiles and features : up to 10 minutes - Intended for broadcasters, production companies and other media - Product to be edited by the client ## COVERAGE - News and big competitions - Press conferences, training sessions, fan reactions, business, etc. - European football championships (Ligue 1, Liga, EPL), Champions League, Europa League (final) - Special events: Football World Cup, Olympic and Paralympic Games... - Red Bull Media House provides editorial content on a wide range of sporting disciplines from racing to esports and extreme sports in various locations around the world: 250 photos and 15 videos per month - Original reports and illustrative images | SLUG | Product | Edited sequences | Voice-over | Sound bite dubbing | Extra rushes | Script | Editable sequences | Sepxounds
rack | | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | | IMAGES | Raw footage with ambient sound, no sound or voice-over | | | | | | | | | | Raw images with sound
(statements, speeches, interviews, etc.) | ⊙ | ⊙ | ⊙ | ⊙ | | | | ## Coverage
24 hours a day
7 days a week +380^∘ editable videos per month ## 130
production points worldwide ## PRODUCT FORMATS Delivery of metadata: XML Video formats: MPEG4 H. 264 [16:9]; 1920x1080 (.mp4); MPEG4 H. 264 [16:9] 1280x720 (.mp4) ; MPEG4 H. 264 [16:9] 640x360 (.mp4); MPEG2 [16:9 - PAL] 720x576 (.mpg or .mp2) ## SUBSCRIPTION Feed Package Per item ## DELIVERY METHODS - Satellite - FTP - API - AFP Forum \& AFP News # AFPTV SPORTS IN FRENCH ## COVERAGE | | AFPTV
Sports | 510 | Highlights | | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | | International competitions | | | | | Summer \& Winter Olympic Games - football World Cup | x | x | x | | Tour de France and La Vuelta | x | | x | | Continental competitions | | | | | Champions League: training and press conferences from main matches in the first phases, all matches in the final phase - UEFA Euro - Copa America | x | | | | Regional competitions | | | | | Bundesliga | | x | | | All sports: football, tennis, cricket, athletics, motorsports, swimming, cycling (see all the competitions in the ASO calendar), golf, basketball, handball, rugby, skiing, figure skating, boxing, gymnastics, baseball. | x | | | | Institutions: Sports Institution news (IOC, FIFA, federations, clubs, athletes, sponsors). Press conferences, interviews, voxpops, business, economy, conferences, doping. | x | | | # AFPTV SPORTS IN FRENCH ## ATOC PRODUCT CODES | Product code | Subscription method | Product name | Average production volume | Delivery | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | M16112 | Feed | Media.Fil.Video.AFPTV Sport.en français | | Satellite Europe and MENA (HD) FTP API AFP Forum + AFP News | | M16114 | Package | Media.Forfait.Video.AFPTV Sport.en français | 10 * / day | | | | | | | AFP Forum | | M16116 | Per item | Media.A La Pièce.Video.AFPTV Sport.en français | | | *Average volume from January to December 2024 # AFPTV SPORTS IN ENGLISH ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Raw images with or without sound - Fully edited video reports - Video length: from 30 seconds to 4 minutes / profiles and features: up to 10 minutes - Intended for broadcasters, production companies and other media - Product to be edited by the client ## COVERAGE - News and big competitions - Press conferences, training sessions, fan reactions, business, etc. - European football championships (Ligue 1, Liga, Premier League, Bundesliga, Serie A), Champions League, Europa League (final) - Special events: Football World Cup, Olympic and Paralympic Games... - Red Bull Media House provides editorial content on a wide range of sporting disciplines from racing to esports and extreme sports in various locations around the world: 250 photos and 15 videos per month - PAL] 720x576 (.mpg or .mp2) | | | ![img-9.jpeg](img-9.jpeg) **Average volume from January to December 2024* # AFPTV SPORTS IN ENGLISH ## COVERAGE | | AFPTV
Sports | SID | Highlights | | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | | International competitions | | | | | Winter Olympic Games 2022 - football World Cup 2022 | x | x | x | | Tour de France and La Vuelta 2022 | x | | x | | Continental competitions | | | | | Champions League: training and press conferences from main matches in the first phases, all matches in the final phase - UEFA Euro - Copa America | x | | | | Regional competitions | | | | | Bundesliga | | x | | | All sports: football, tennis, cricket, athletics, motorsports, swimming, cycling (see all the competitions in the ASO calendar), golf, basketball, handball, rugby, skiing, figure skating, boxing, gymnastics, baseball. | x | | | | Institutions: Sports Institution news (IOC, FIFA, federations, clubs, athletes, sponsors). Press conferences, interviews, voxpops, business, economy, conferences, doping. | x | | | # AFPTV SPORTS IN ENGLISH ## ATOC PRODUCT CODE | Product code | Subscription method | Product name | Average production volume | Delivery | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | M16113 | Feed | Media.Wire.Video.AFPTV Sports.in English | | Satellite Europe and MENA (HD) FTP API AFP Forum + AFP News | | M16115 | Package | Media.Forfait.Video.AFPTV Sports.in English | 10 * / day | | | M16117 | Per item | Media.A La Pièce.Video.AFPTV Sports.in English | | AFP Forum \& AFP News | # AFPTV SPORTS ## ASO EVENT CALENDAR 2025 | ASO CALENDAR 2025 | | | --- | --- | | **CYCLING** | | | 9-16 MARCH | PARIS-NICE | | APRIL 13 | PARIS-ROUBAIX | | APRIL 23 | FLÈCHE WALLONNE | | APRIL 27 | LIÈGE-BASTOGNE-LIÈGE | | JUNE 8-15 | CRITÉRIUM DU DAUPHINÉ | | JULY 5-27 | TOUR DE FRANCE | | AUGUST 23-SEPTEMBER 14 | VUELTA | | OCTOBER 12 | PARIS-TOURS | | **MOTOR SPORTS** | | | JANUARY 3-17 | DAKAR | | **RUNNING** | | | APRIL 13 | PARIS MARATHON | | **MOUNTAIN BIKING** | | | OCTOBER 8 | ROC D'AZUR | | **FOOTBALL** | | | TBD | BALLON D'OR | # 2025 AFP SPORTS STORIES PRODUCT FACT FILE # AFP SPORTS STORIES ## DESCRIPTION - Multimedia reports consisting of text, photos, infographics, video and contextualised video; ready-to-use articles ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Automatic integration of articles into the client's site: - Integration of articles in real time in chronological order for easy and complete online access - Customised content integration to suit the client's content and upload preferences - Multiple editorial and technical formats for optimised adaptation to all digital media: web and mobile sites, public screens and any other interactive information medium and connected TV. ## ADDED VALUE - Productivity gains for media departments for non-core topics, thanks to instant publication of content and continuous feed to web and mobile sites - Sections adapted to suit each production language - Unique metadata to index and reference each news story ## AVAILABLE I ANGUAGES - Service available in 9 languages: French, English, German, Spanish, Arabic, Portuguese, simplified and traditional Chinese. 108 *Articles illustrated per day (all languages) > The image contains three sections of text, each with a black background and white font. The first section reads: "Coverage 24 hours a day 7 days a week." The second section states: "+ 300* editable videos per month." The third section says: "130 video production points worldwide." | Languages | Number of sections | | --- | --- | | French | 3 | | English | 5 | | Spanish | 6 | | German | 19 | | Portuguese | 2 | | Arabic | 1 | | Chinese | 1 | ## PRODUCT FORMATS - Text: NewsML 1.2, XML, HTML, NewsML G2 formats - Photos: rectangular formats 768px, 245px, 110px square formats 220px, 170px, 120px - Videos: Mpeg4 H.264, Flash, MP2 PAL ## SUBSCRIPTION - To the section - Feed ## DELIVERY METHODS - FTP - API - AFP Forum # AFP SPORTS STORIES ## IN FRENCH ### COVERAGE - 3 thematic sections providing comprehensive coverage of international news. ![img-10.jpeg](img-10.jpeg) ### SECTIONS | AFP Stories Sections in French | Topic Daily average | Updated Daily average | Illustrations per article (photos & infographics) Daily average | Number of articles with video Daily average | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | Football* | 4 | 10 | 1 | 1 | | Sports* | 13 | 19 | 2 | 1 | | Olympic Games* | 1 | 1 | 2 | 1 | | Total (average) > The image contains three sections with information about a publication or content coverage. The first section states "Coverage 24 hours a day 7 days a week" in white text on a black background. The second section highlights "3 Thematic sections" in white text on a black background. The third section indicates "+ 15* articles illustrated per day" in white text on a black background, with an asterisk next to the number 15. * | 18 | 30 | | | ### Type of reports Magazine Post-match analysis Factual Presentations ### Detail of coverage in the "sports"** section - Basketball - Motor sports - Rugby - Football - Tennis - Olympics - Cyclism ![img-11.jpeg](img-11.jpeg) > The pie chart is divided into eight segments, each representing a different percentage of the whole. The largest segment, occupying 32%, is colored light blue. The second largest, at 17%, is yellow. The third largest, at 14%, is red. The fourth, at 12%, is dark blue. The fifth, at 11%, is purple. The sixth, at 7%, is orange. The seventh, also at 7%, is light green. The smallest segment, at 1%, is not visible in the description but is likely the remaining part of the chart. *Average volume from January to December 2024 **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events # AFP SPORTS STORIES ## IN ENGLISH ### COVERAGE - 5 thematic sections providing comprehensive coverage of international news. ![img-12.jpeg](img-12.jpeg) ### SECTIONS | AFP Stories Sections in English | Topic Daily average | Updated Daily average | Illustrations per article (photos & infographics) Daily average | Number of articles with video Daily average | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | Sports* | 35 | 50 | 2 | 1 | | Football* | 14 | 21 | 2 | 1 | | Cricket* | 3 | 7 | 1 | 1 | | US Sports* | 8 | 11 | 2 | 1 | | Olympic Games* | 3 | 1 | 1 | 1 | | Total (average) > The image contains three black rectangular sections with white text. The first section states: "Coverage 24 hours a day 7 days a week." The second section reads: "5 Thematic sections." The third section mentions: "+ 60* articles illustrated per day." * | 63 | 90 | | | ### *Detail of coverage in the "sports" section* - Athletics - Basketball - Cricket - Cyclism - Golf - Motor sports - Rugby - Football - Tennis - Olympics ![img-13.jpeg](img-13.jpeg) > This is a pie chart divided into multiple segments, each representing a different percentage. The largest segment, occupying 35% of the chart, is colored blue. The second largest, at 15%, is purple. The third largest, at 10%, is light blue, and another segment at 10% is gray. Other segments include 9% in black, 8% in dark gray, 5% in yellow, 3% in orange, 3% in light green, and 1% in red. The chart visually displays the proportions of each category relative to the whole. *Average volume from January to December 2024* *Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events # AFP SPORTS STORIES ## IN SPANISH ### COVERAGE - 4 thematic sections providing comprehensive coverage of international news. ![img-14.jpeg](img-14.jpeg) ### SECTIONS | AFP Stories Sections in Spanish | Topic Daily average | Updated Daily average | Illustrations per article (photos & infographics) Daily average | Number of articles with video Daily average | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | *Campeonatos* | 2 | 1 | - | - | | *Fútbol* | 6 | 13 | 1 | 1 | | *Madrid-Deportes* | 12 | 17 | 1 | 1 | | *Periodico Deportes* | 13 | 18 | 1 | 1 | | *Ultimo de Fútbol* | 11 | 15 | 1 | 1 | | *Juegos Olímpicos* | 4 | 3 | 1 | 1 | | *Total (average) > The image contains three black boxes with white text. The first box states: "Coverage 6am to midnight." The second box reads: "6 Thematic sections." The third box says: "+ 45* articles illustrated per day." * | 48 | 67 | | | *Detail of coverage in the "sports" section* ![img-15.jpeg](img-15.jpeg) **Average volume from January to December 2024* **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events* # AFP SPORTS STORIES ## IN GERMAN / SID ready2publish ## COVERAGE - 15 thematic sections providing comprehensive coverage of international news. | Coverage 7am to midnight | 15 Thematic sections | +75* articles illustrated per day | | --- | --- | --- | | | | | ## SECTIONS | AFP Stories Sections in German | Topic Daily average | Updated Daily average | Illustrations per article (photos \& infographics) Daily average | Number of articles with video Daily average | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | Basketball* | 3 | 3 | - | - | | Eishockey* | 2 | 3 | - | - | | Football* | 6 | 1 | - | - | | Formel-Eins* | 1 | 2 | - | - | | Fuba-WM-Quali* | 0 | 0 | - | - | | Fußball* | 29 | 32 | - | - | | Golf* | - | 1 | - | - | | Handball* | 2 | 2 | - | - | | Leichtathletik* | 1 | 2 | - | - | | Motorsport* | 2 | 3 | - | - | | Olympia* | 3 | 3 | - | - | | Paralympics* | 0 | - | - | - | | Radsport* | 1 | 2 | - | - | | Schwimmen* | 1 | 1 | - | - | | Segeln* | 0 | 0 | - | - | | Sport-Allgemen* | 15 | 18 | - | - | | Tennis* | 3 | 4 | - | - | | Wintersport* | 6 | 8 | - | - | | Fuba-WM* | 2 | 2 | - | - | | Total (average) > The pie chart displays the distribution of different sports activities by percentage. Athletics is the smallest segment at 5%, represented in light blue. * | 77 | 87 | | | SID has special event sections for the Olympic Games, FIFA World Cups and UEFA European Championships. *Average volume from January to December 2024* *Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events # AFP SPORTS STORIES ## IN PORTUGUESE ### COVERAGE - 1 thematic section providing comprehensive coverage of international news. ![img-16.jpeg](img-16.jpeg) ### SECTIONS | AFP Stories Sections in Portuguese | Topic Daily average | Updated Daily average | Illustrations per article (photos & infographics) > The image contains three black rectangular boxes with white text inside each. title: 2025 GENERAL SPORTS OFFER PRODUCT FACT FILE
